level.heading: DEFINITIONS (§ 19-199) When used in this chapter, the following words shall have the meanings ascribed: Act – the Washington Convention Center Authority Act of 1994, effectiveeptember 28, 1994 (D.C. Law 10-188), as amended by the Fiscal Year 2010 Budgetupport Act of 2009, effective March 3, 2010 (D.C. Law 18-111, D.C. Officialode §§ 10-1201.01 et seq.). Authority – the Washington Convention and Sports Authority established byhe Act. Member – a Member of the Authority’s Board of Directors. Misconduct – any criminally prosecutable or fraudulent act by a Member inelation to the duties of his or her office that is willful in character. Neglect of duty – the careless or intentional failure by a Member toxercise due diligence in the performance of his or her official duties.
SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 3816, 3823 (June 12, 1998); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10919, 10926 (November 19,010); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 8953 (June 14, 2013).
